SEARCH
Package Project

Interface ProjectControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectController
public interface ProjectControllerInterface
Interface that defines the core functionality for controlling and interacting with housing development projects. This includes operations for applicants, officers, managers, and general project data handling.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    bookFlat(String projectName, Flat.Type flatType)
    Attempts to book a flat of a specified type in a given project.
    void
    displayAdminProjectDetails(String projectName)
    Displays all relevant administrative project details including flat and personnel assignments.

    Displays the project dashboard for a given manager.

    Displays detailed flat information of a given type for a specific project.

  • Method Details

    • saveChanges

      void saveChanges()
      Saves any modifications made to the project repository.

    • getRepo

      ProjectRepo getRepo()
      Retrieves the repository containing all project data.
      Returns:
      the ProjectRepo instance.

    • displayProjectDashboard

      void displayProjectDashboard(Applicant applicant, ResidentialApplicationController residentialApplicationController)
      Displays the project dashboard for a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant whose dashboard is being displayed.
      residentialApplicationController - the controller handling residential applications.

    • displayTeamProjectsToApply

      String displayTeamProjectsToApply(HdbOfficer officer)
      Displays the list of team-based projects that an officer can apply to.
      Parameters:
      officer - the HdbOfficer requesting the view.
      Returns:
      the project names available to the officer.

    • displayResProjectsToApply

      String displayResProjectsToApply(HdbOfficer officer, Flat.Type flatType)
      Displays the list of residential projects that an officer can apply to, based on flat type.
      Parameters:
      officer - the HdbOfficer applying.
      flatType - the type of flat (e.g., TWOROOM, THREEROOM).
      Returns:
      the name of the project that the officer can apply to.

    • displayProjectDashboard

      ArrayList<Object> displayProjectDashboard(HdbManager manager)
      Displays the project dashboard for a given manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HdbManager viewing the dashboard.
      Returns:
      a list of objects to be displayed on the manager's dashboard.

    • displayProjectFlatDetails

      void displayProjectFlatDetails(String projectName, Flat.Type flatType)
      Displays detailed flat information of a given type for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.
      flatType - the type of flat to display details for.

    • displayAdminProjectDetails

      void displayAdminProjectDetails(String projectName)
      Displays all relevant administrative project details including flat and personnel assignments.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.

    • getProject

      Project getProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a project by name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.
      Returns:
      the Project object corresponding to the given name.

    • bookFlat

      boolean bookFlat(String projectName, Flat.Type flatType)
      Attempts to book a flat of a specified type in a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.
      flatType - the type of flat to be booked.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful, false otherwise.
